name: Passimian
description: The Teamwork Pokémon. They use their saliva to stick leaves to their shoulders. You can tell what troop they belong to from the position of the leaves.

abilities.name: Receiver
abilities.description: When switched in after an ally faints, this Pokémon copies the non-hidden ability of the fainted ally until switched out.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is suffering from a negative status effect or stat change imposed by an opponent, it gains +2 to all attack rolls.
